name: Pokémon Dimension Legends
overview: Description: Pokemon Dimension Legends is an interesting Pokemon FireRed Hack it won Hack of the Week Award from Pokecommunity. The history of this region was associated with Pokemon Legendaries. A sentence has been retransmitted to future generations “When a portal to an unknown Dimension is open. The fate of the world lies in the hand of a boy who is belived to have the power to stop the God Of Chaos”. Story: You are Ace and the main character. You are a wandering boy in the Deria region far, from your hometown. The reason you came to this region is due to a promise to your grandmother before she died. Many secrets await. What is the link between Pokemon Legendaries and this region? Features: • More challenging GYM Leaders • New storyline • Many Pokemon from an assortment of Generations • New characters • New routes • New music & sounds • New sprites • New animations
